mapper.select: SELECT id, picture_group_id, picture_format, filepath, sequence, create_time, update_time FROM pictureRef WHERE picture_group_id = #{pictureGroupId} ORDER BY sequence ASC
SELECT id FROM pictureRef WHERE picture_group_id = #{pictureGroupId} ORDER BY sequence LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM pictureRef WHERE picture_group_id = #{pictureGroupId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pictureRef(picture_group_id, picture_format, filepath, sequence) VALUES(#{pictureGroupId}, #{pictureFormat}, #{filepath}, #{sequence})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM pictureRef WHERE picture_group_id = #{pictureGroupId} AND id = #{pictureId}
